TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi sealed ADODC/EOFActionEnum extends System.Enum

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.* classes are obsolete and supported within 32 bit processes only. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=160862")

summary.span: Provides constants for compatibility with the Visual Basic 6.0 property.

span.span: Provides constants for compatibility with the Visual Basic 6.0 property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Visual Basic 6.0 で、`EOFAction`どのような操作を決定するプロパティは使用されて、`ADODC`ときに、`EOF`プロパティが true です。In Visual Basic 6.0, the `EOFAction` property was used to determine what action the `ADODC` takes when the `EOF` property is true. これらの定数には、引き続き追加変更せずに実行する Visual Basic 6.0 からアップグレードされたコードが有効にします。These constants enable code that has been upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0 to continue to run without additional modification. > [!NOTE] > 名前空間の関数とオブジェクトは、Visual Basic 6.0 から Visual Basic へのアップグレード ツールで使用するために用意されています。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. ほとんどの場合、これらの関数とオブジェクトの機能と重複を見つけることができる他の名前空間で、[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]です。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 必要とされるだけと Visual Basic 6.0 のコード モデルと大きく異なる、[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]実装します。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

summary.span: Moving past the last record triggers the 's event to occur on the current record, followed by an automatic , followed by a event on the new record.

span.span: Moving past the last record triggers the 's event to occur on the current record, followed by an automatic , followed by a event on the new record.

span.span: Keeps the last record as the current record.
